title.rendered: Need Beauticians for your Beauty Parlour in 2024?

content.rendered:
So, how do you find Beauticians for your Beauty Parlour? The traditional referral way?

Good news in 2024 – try Helpers Near Me today.

Find your perfect beautician near your parlour and save the hassle of asking everyone.

Employ whoever you like easily.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

“Did you get your facial done? My beauty parlour owner has a new Beautician who does amazing massage to give your face a real glow.”

“I prefer going to my neighbourhood Parlor. The Beautician there takes care of me during waxing.”

“Ohh, I am always so scared of getting my threading done by someone new. I get it done only by Tina at my Parlor. She does it very nicely and softly.”

“I never let anyone touch my hair except Priyanka at my Parlor. She knows my style & choice.”

“My Beautician at my Parlour is so much in demand that I always have to make a prior appointment with her. She is the best I have known so far.”

These statements hold much value if you are running your own Beauty Parlour.

How much does a Beautician for Beauty Parlour cost in 2024? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring a Beautician for Beauty Parlour in 2024?

The average monthly cost of hiring a Beautician for a Beauty Parlour in 2024 varies between ₹12,000 to ₹15,000 for someone who is either fresher or has little experience.

However, in cases where the Beauticians have decent years of experience, they can charge a monthly salary of up to ₹20,000 to ₹23,000.

(SOURCE – SalaryTracker)

Do you want to check the Beautician cost near you in 2024? Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

You can hear statements like the above when a woman starts discussing and talking about her beauty regime.

Every girl and woman is obsessed with her beauty and personal hygiene.

And therefore, they must trust the hands & individuals who work on their bodies.

Consider a teenager going to the parlour for the first time.

Usually, she is a little scared to get her threading done – because she has heard from many of her friends that it hurts a lot.

She is scared to get her waxing done – again, it hurts a lot. In such a case, it is critical that the beautician doing the threading and waxing is good and can develop a comfort zone with the teenage girl.

Similarly, think of a woman who is obsessed with her hair. She would always be very particular about who does her hair.

In another scenario, even if a woman wants to get her facial done and feels relaxed during her beauty treatment, the Beautician should be an expert to make her feel comfortable and provide her with the best quality massage.

This means only one thing – your beautician must be an expert and experienced enough to make your Customer feel relaxed & comfortable.

As a renowned Beauty Parlor Owner among your Customers, even you would have taken a lot of time & effort to build such a relationship with your Customers.

In your initial days, you would have worked as a Beautician to understand every customer’s needs.

And now, when you have a well-established Parlour running in the city’s heart, how do you ensure you get the best Beautician when you need one?

How do you ensure you have the best Beauticians for Beauty Parlour?

How do you find the Beauticians near your Parlour?

And since you understand the importance of your Customer’s obsession with their beauty, you know that you need to invest enough time, money & effort with your Beauticians. So that they build on the relationship with your Customer the way you did.

It is equally essential that you put a lot of thought before you hire a new Beautician and give them detailed training before you let them start working on your loyal Customers.

As the Owner of your Parlour, usually, these are the options you try:

  1. You put up an Advert in your local newspaper
  2. If you are comfortable online, you can also release ads on some classified websites.
  3. Check with your current Beauticians if they know someone good from around
  4. At times, you even put up a notice in front of your Parlor
  5. Ask your friend who is in a similar line of business.

But all these methods are not always foolproof.

The chances are that you may not get any results within the short time that you have in hand.

At times, to fulfil the need, you also get girls with no prior experience but are willing to learn & work.

You take enough pain to train them and wait patiently until they become experts. And then, one fine day, they end up leaving you. And you are again back to square one.

This cycle would continue for as long as you run your Beauty Parlour.

So, if the business has to exist, does a reliable source from where you can find Beauticians for Beauty Parlour when you need them?

Well, from today, here’s a technology-driven answer to your current problem.

From this day onward, you will not face the same challenge when you need beauticians for your beauty parlour.

Meet Helpers Near Me.

It helps you find beauticians near you in the easiest possible way.

Helpers Near Me lets you find Beauticians for beauty parlours near you in just 5 minutes. Even the charges are nominal – starting at ₹99 only.

Furthermore, it connects you with many Beauticians for beauty parlours near you, not just one of them.

7 compelling reasons why you should try Helpers Near Me when you need Beauticians for your Beauty Parlour in 2024:

  1. It is convenient – At Helpers Near Me, you can find Beauticians for beauty parlours at your convenience. It is Easier, Simpler and Better. 5 minutes and just a click of a few buttons is all it takes to find Beauticians on this App.
  2. Verified Beauticians for Beauty Parlour – Helpers Near Me verifies the background of every Beautician thoroughly. The platform follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Beautician. First, Helpers Near Me verified their IDs. Second, The platform verifies their Criminal Court Records across thousands of District Courts in India. At an additional nominal fee of ₹199, you can even get this detailed Background Verification report.
  3. Beauticians for Beauty Parlour from nearby – With Helpers Near Me, you find Beauticians in your vicinity
  4. Offers choices of Beauticians – Helpers Near Me connects you with multiple Beauticians in every order, not just one of them. It provides choices so you can choose the best one among all the available options.
  5. Find Beauticians from a vast pool – Helpers Near Me has thousands of Beauticians associated with its platform. So, when you search for one, you get the best of the choices available from within your locality.
  6. Nominal Charges only – You can find multiple Beauticians at a nominal fee. And once you hire one Beauticians or two from the available options, you don’t need to pay anything further. A nominal fee is all it takes.
  7. No Agents/Contractors in between – You get to contact beauticians directly at Helpers Near Me. There are no middlemen in between.

Imagine the convenience of finding Beauticians for Beauty Parlour in just a few minutes.

So, next time you need Beauticians, try Helpers Near Me. 

By far, Helpers Near Me is the easiest way you can find Beauticians near you.

This initiative of Helpers Near Me is helping uplift Beauticians by connecting them with their Employers like yourself.

Helpers Near Me lets you connect with over 100+ profiles of Helpers at Homes & Small Businesses.

It is the easiest way to find many other helpers – like Maids, Cooks, Babysitters, Drivers, Office Boys, Delivery Boys, Waiters, Store Helpers, Peons, Assistants and many more such Helpers.

We recommend hiring workers from Helpers Near Me. Here’s why:

Helpers Near Me uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.

Find how many Workers have joined the movement to connect with YOU directly.

Many of the workers have also received local employment opportunities.
